name: musica-carrosel
description: Aplicação de carrossel de música com player do YouTube

scripts.build: python3 update_markdown_content.py && tailwindcss -i ./css/input.css -o ./css/tailwind.css --minify && npm run build:static
scripts.build:static: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist dist/css dist/js dist/assets 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f index.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -R js/* dist/js/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -R assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f css/tailwind.css css/custom.css css/youtube-player.css dist/css/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f MUSICA_9.csv dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f *.svg dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f *.jpg dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f *.png dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f package.json dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f README.md dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f README.md dist/readme.md 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f citacoes.md dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f content.js dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f defaultExtractor.js dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f cacheInvalidation.js dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f netlify.toml dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
